2073550.name: Lord of Demons
2073550.description:
Lord of Demons is a fantasy-third person action-tactics game where you control demons, cast mighty spells and fulfill evil objectives to conquer islands.

Key Features:


  • cast mighty elemental spells, different enemies have different weaknesses
  • control your army strategically
  • use oil barrels, the mine spell and more to build traps - then lure your enemies into them
  • complete various evil missions to take over islands (destroy towers, capture humans, kill enemy generals, raise undeads, ..)
  • destroy buildings for loot
  • invest in upgrades to become the ultimate lord
  • conquer procedurally generated islands
2073550.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
